text: Thanks AJ. I will look into it.

Hello. I have added CTA on page that links to internal file download. But when I download the document and I look at the analytics of the CTA, all counters are still set to zero. Is there some additional step I need to do to activate CTA?

I created a simple app using get-started link
(<https://app.HubSpot.com/developer/><dev-id>/application/<app-id>/sample-app-checklist)

I wanted to add payment options. is there document for that?
May I can integrate HubSpotâ€™s payment gateway (or something else) and charge users of my app
Bonjour! i'm a freelance web developer from Montreal. Brand new to HubSpot and its CMS

Hi Gomzy, great question. Currently we don't have any payment options or payment gateways to integrate with just yet. The subscription and payment functionality will have to be handled directly from within your app. I suggest creating another post in the API channel asking other developers how they handle this or what code libraries they use to manage this process :slightly_smiling_face:
Hello! I'm a freelance web developer in Toronto :smile:
